data: {"generalSituation":"The northeast monsoon associated with a cold front will affect the coast of southern China in the next couple of days. The weather will be dry with cool mornings and nights over the region. With the monsoon moderating midweek next week, the weather will improve over the coast of Guangdong with temperatures rising gradually. But the temperature difference between day and night will be relatively large over the inland areas. A broad band of clouds is expected to bring a few rain patches to southern China towards the weekend. With the band of clouds thinning out, the weather will be brighter over the region during the next weekend.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20251214","week":"Sunday","forecastWind":"North to northeast force 4 to 5, occasionally force 6 offshore at first, and up to force 7 on high ground.","forecastWeather":"Becoming cool. Mainly cloudy.
